artist: Artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Artist: Niwa Tōkei (double pages 7, 8, 21, 34); Artist: Ishida Yūtei (double pages 9, 39); Artist: Nishimura Nantei (double page 15); Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with light blue cover; white label with black text on cover; inscription in black text inside cover; some text pages; images include aerial landscape views, children playing and women with baskets, group outdoors with men spreading cloths on the ground in a garden, swordsmen in armor fighting, street scene with men watching women playing shamisen, people viewing square pools of fish attended by men with nets walking on planks, soldier on horseback with a large bow
markings: on first text page, stamped: two black stamps and one red stamp
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu (Settsu meisho zue 摂津名所圖會)
text: Devoted to Yatabe County 八部郡.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu, vol. 8a
